label: TESTE-01 · Cena Estabelecimento
prompt: A modern school hallway on the first day of school. Bright LED lights reflect off polished floors. Two teenage girls almost collide. Anime-inspired soft shading, wide establishing shot, warm ambient light.

label: TESTE-02 · Valen — 'Foi mal.'
prompt: A teenage girl, composed but slightly embarrassed, speaking a brief apology, direct gaze, school hallway background. Close-up shot.
